code: import{useState}from'react';import julioSomo from'../assets/images/image-juliusomo.png';import moment from'moment';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CommentForm=_ref=>{let{addComment}=_ref;const[userName,setUserName]=useState("juliosomo");const[text,setText]=useState("");const[profilePic,setProfilePic]=useState(julioSomo);const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();setProfilePic(julioSomo);setUserName('juliosomo');const timeStamp=moment().format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss');addComment({text,profilePic,userName,timeStamp});setText("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"profilePicture",src:julioSomo,alt:"profile_picture"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{maxLength:150,value:text,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value),placeholder:"Add a comment...."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"SEND"})]});};export{CommentForm};
